item.title: CatelJsonContractResolver
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Serialization.Json Namespace Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public class CatelJsonContractResolver : DefaultContractResolver Base types DefaultContractResolver Contract resolver to ensure that Catel models will be serialized by the Catel serializers. Methods ResolveContractConverter(Type objectType) Resolves the contract converter. Parameters Name Description objectType Type of the object.

item.title: CatelJsonConverter
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Serialization.Json Namespace Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public class CatelJsonConverter : JsonConverter Base types JsonConverter Converts Catel models manually using the Catel serializer. Fields Constructors CatelJsonConverter(IJsonSerializer jsonSerializer, ISerializationConfiguration configuration) Initializes a new instance of the CatelJsonConverter class. Parameters Name Description jsonSerializer The json serializer.

item.title: ICustomJsonSerializable
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Serialization.Json Namespace Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public interface ICustomJsonSerializable Allows a type to implement their own (de)serialization mechanism. Methods Deserialize(JsonReader jsonReader) Serializes the object from the specified json reader. Note that the object is always constructed by the serialization engine, the object itself must read the values from the jsonReader.

item.title: IJsonSerializer
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Serialization.Json Namespace Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public interface IJsonSerializer : ISerializer Implements interfaces ISerializer Interface for the binary serializer. Properties PreserveReferences Gets or sets a value indicating whether references should be preserved. This will add additional$graphid and$graphrefid properties to each json object.

item.title: JsonSerializationConfiguration
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Serialization.Json Namespace Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public class JsonSerializationConfiguration : SerializationConfiguration Base types SerializationConfiguration Serialization configuration with additional json configuration. Properties DateParseHandling Gets or sets the date parse handling. DateTimeKind Gets or sets the kind of the date time.

item.title: JsonSerializationContextInfo
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Serialization.Json Namespace Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public class JsonSerializationContextInfo : ISerializationContextInfo Implements interfaces ISerializationContextInfo Class containing all information about the Json serialization context. Constructors JsonSerializationContextInfo(JsonSerializer jsonSerializer, JsonReader jsonReader, JsonWriter jsonWriter) Initializes a new instance of the JsonSerializationContextInfo class.

item.title: JsonSerializationContextInfoFactory
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Serialization.Json Namespace Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6 public class JsonSerializationContextInfoFactory : ISerializationContextInfoFactory Implements interfaces ISerializationContextInfoFactory Json serialization context factory. Methods GetSerializationContextInfo(ISerializer serializer, object model, object data, ISerializationConfiguration configuration) Gets the serialization context information. Parameters Name Description serializer The serializer. model The model.

item.title: JsonSerializer
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Serialization.Json Namespace Catel.Runtime.Serialization.Json Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public class JsonSerializer : IJsonSerializer, SerializerBase<JsonSerializationContextInfo> Base types SerializerBase Implements interfaces IJsonSerializer The binary serializer. Fields GraphId The graph identifier. GraphRefId The graph reference identifier. TypeName The type name. Constructors JsonSerializer(ISerializationManager serializationManager, ITypeFactory typeFactory, IObjectAdapter objectAdapter) Initializes a new instance of the JsonSerializer class.
